title: Hong Kong budget proposals offer COVID relief with tax breaks, handouts
description: Hong Kong will offer tax breaks, handouts and subsidies to small businesses and residents, to mitigate the impact of a new wave of social restrictions to curb COVID-19 infections, Finance Secretary Paul Chan said in his 2022/23 budget speech.
content: HONG KONG, Feb 23 (Reuters) - Hong Kong will offer tax breaks, handouts and subsidies to small businesses and residents, to mitigate the impact of a new wave of social restrictions to curb COVID-19 iâ€¦ [+2889 chars]
